Description: Spring Hill / Union Square / Kirkland/Harvard area, 1 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom apartment. Cats are allowed. Amenities include hardwood floors, a living room and storage space. Cost of rent includes electricity, heat and hot water. Has in-building laundry. The eat-in kitchen features an electric range and gas range. Broker fee may apply. Available on 09/01. SOM-1246
